abilities.name: Damnation
abilities.description: Innate: Enemy  champions, large  minions and large  monsters that die near Thresh drop a Soul for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 Souls instead. Small minions and lesser monsters have a 33.33% chance to drop a Soul.
descriptions: Innate: Enemy  champions, large  minions and large  monsters that die near Thresh drop a Soul for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 Souls instead. Small minions and lesser monsters have a 33.33% chance to drop a Soul.
Thresh autonomously collects Souls near him or a placed  Dark Passage.
Each collected Soul grants Thresh  0.75 ability power and  0.75 bonus armor.

abilities.name: Death Sentence
abilities.description: Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming unable to move or attack while it is in flight.
descriptions: Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming unable to move or attack while it is in flight.

The scythe stops with the first enemy it hits, dealing magic damage,  revealing them, and  stunning them for 1.5 seconds while also forming a  tether between Thresh and them for the duration. Hitting an enemy reduces Death Sentence's  cooldown by 3 seconds and  slows Thresh by 20% for 1 second.

While the tether persists, Thresh is unable to declare basic attacks and periodically tugs at his scythe's chain,  pulling the target a short distance towards himself. After 0.5 seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a  minion or  monster, Thresh can recast the ability to cast Deathly Leap, doing so will cause him to stop tugging.
Recast: Thresh  dashes to the tethered enemy, becoming able to attack again upon arrival. Thresh can cast any of his abilities while in flight with the exception of  The Box.

abilities.name: Dark Passage
abilities.description: Active: Thresh throws his lantern to the target location which lands after 0.5 seconds, lasting for 6 seconds or until he moves too far away from it,  revealing its surroundings.
abilities.leveling: Shield Strength:60 / 100 / 140 / 180 / 220 (+ 1 per Soul collected)
descriptions: Active: Thresh throws his lantern to the target location which lands after 0.5 seconds, lasting for 6 seconds or until he moves too far away from it,  revealing its surroundings.

Thresh and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a  shield for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it,  dashing to Thresh's current location and gaining the shield.
An ally cannot select the lantern while  silenced,  grounded or  immobilized.

abilities.name: Flay
abilities.description: Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, with the  AD ratio increasing based on the time spent not basic attacking enemies, up to 10 seconds.
abilities.leveling: Minimum Bonus Magic Damage:»1 per Soul collected (+ 0% AD)«Maximum Bonus Magic Damage:1 per Soul collected (+ 100 / 125 / 150 / 175 / 200% AD)
levelings: Minimum Bonus Magic Damage:»1 per  Soul collected (+ 0% AD)«Maximum Bonus Magic Damage:1 per  Soul collected (+ 100 / 125 / 150 / 175 / 200% AD)
descriptions: Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, with the  AD ratio increasing based on the time spent not basic attacking enemies, up to 10 seconds.

Active: Thresh sweeps his chain around him and in a broad line towards the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit,  knocking them in the chain's direction, and afterwards  slowing them for 1 second.

abilities.name: The Box
abilities.description: Active: Thresh surrounds himself with a pentagon of spectral walls, each one lasting for up to 5 seconds. Walls break upon contact with an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to the target and  slowing them by 99% for 2 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Thresh surrounds himself with a pentagon of spectral walls, each one lasting for up to 5 seconds. Walls break upon contact with an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to the target and  slowing them by 99% for 2 seconds.
Enemy champions hitting any wall beyond the first take no damage and are  slowed for only 1 second.

name: Thresh
title: the Chain Warden
blurb: Sadistic and cunning, Thresh is an ambitious and restless spirit of the Shadow Isles. Once the custodian of countless arcane secrets, he was undone by a power greater than life or death, and now sustains himself by tormenting and breaking others with...
